alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 05 at 12:57AM CDT until November 05 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR ASHLEY COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN ARKANSAS AND MOREHOUSE PARISHES... At 1257 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Monticello to near Bastrop, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Galion around 115 AM CDT. Jones around 125 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mer Rouge and Bonita. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
